title: TNF Preview, Week 3 WR/CB Matchups 2022
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp preview Thursday Night Football before telling us the best WR matchups for the week including how to manage expectations for bad matchups. Then, Adam Schefter joins to talk the storylines to watch this week and tell us why Kyle Pitts needs more targets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: TNF Preview, What WR's NEED To Be In Your Lineup This Week?
